website_summaries.verdict: This 5-bowl set features deep bowls and an attractive appearance with a variety of silicone cap colors.
pros: Nonslip silicone bottoms are effective and ship in a variety of colors
Bowls are on the deep side
cons: Some buyers feel the metal is thin or flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: Incorrect website description? Or did I get a lemon? The largest bowl (pink on the bottom) is 4.5 qt. The description states it comes with a 7 qt size, which is why I bought it. On its way to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Allison J.

customer_reviews.title: Description misleading
customer_reviews.text: False advertising- the description said the largest bowl is 7 quarts. When i received the box it looked quite small. It turns out the largest bowl is actually 4.5 quarts. Returning this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's taters, precious? Po-ta-toes.
customer_reviews.text: These bowls look great and don't slide all over datgum tarnation when I'm tryin to make mashed taters. (Boil 'em, mash 'em, stick 'em in a stew.)
customer_reviews.author: mtmule

customer_reviews.title: Plating is chipping
customer_reviews.text: I've had them a little over a year and some of the plating is beginning to chip/peel off the insides of the bowls. The sizes are nice and love the silicone base as it keeps them from sliding around on the counter but am quite disappointed with the quality of the plating. They only get used a few times a month, if I used them daily I'm sure the peeling would be even worse and being made in China the plating probably contains lead or some other toxic substance. Won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Well made stainless steel bowls. .Very sturdy only problem is its kind of hard to see the measurement inside unless you turn the bowl up towards the light other than that I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cookies with your daughter are critical part of life.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these balls because my daughter has loved to make cookies with me. We did not have enough mixing bowls and the ones we had were cheap plastic. It was time for an upgrade. When is Bowles arrived they were really well packaged, and they seem to be really heavy duty. We use them to make cookies as a practice run for Christmas. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love the gripping at the bottom of the bowls
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these mixing bowls. The gripping feature at the bottom comes in really handy and I love all the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: 💋AshleyNicole 💋

customer_reviews.title: These rust and smell when wet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these under a month ago, and they are already smell funny and look to be rusting. I doubt they're stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Jellifish

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls and Colours !
customer_reviews.text: Saw the Box that was inside the Amazon Box and it looked like it had a dent but when I opened it was all fine - the Bowls didn’t have any markings or dent etc I posted pictures and haven’t used yet - but they are exactly what I expected, pictures and reviews! My daughter likes to bake, so to make it more encouraging that she doesn’t get bored, I got the Bowls with a touch of colour - huge plus because it’s a great grip to the counter and attractive to the eye :) Haven’t washed or used yet so if any I would add ! But what could I add about bowls further you know :)
customer_reviews.author: Myra MLH

customer_reviews.title: Great, solid mixing bowls!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great mixing bowls. We've only had them for a few days but we've already used them tons... We bake and cook a lot, especially with everyone home now! All the sizes are perfect, and the colorful grips on the bottom work well. Easy to clean, I hand washed the larger ones and ran the smaller ones in the dishwasher... All came out clear and with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: A.NzTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love these bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Great mixing bowls and I love the rubber bottoms so they don’t slid while you are mixing. Also all are different sizes that stack inside of each other so it won’t take up much cabinet space and you can use the size bowl that you need. They are so nice that use them more than just for mixing. I placed salad or fruit salad in the large bowl with tongs at dinner time or at family get togethers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Best mixing bowls I could have purchased. The different sizes are exactly what I was looking for in order for my husband to make Kraft Mac N Cheese or for me to make mashed potatoes or potato salad. We have glass bowls, but I wanted something simple and diverse for my boys to use. The silicone bottom also helps with the youngest of my boys 😉
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: No seven quart bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to note that this set is 1q-4.5q, there is NO SEVEN QUART BOWL. I am happy with the set. It seems sturdy and I like the no slip bottoms but description is incorrect so 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Really does not slip, easy to wash up and stack away
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 91 yr old Dad, he loves spending time in the kitchen. It's made it easier for him since they don't slide around (like the spaghetti sauce incident in a regular metal bowl) and since he's still baffled by the new dishwasher it doesn't take much to wash and dry by hand. He can also find them easier since they stack well and take up less room. They are a medium weight and haven't sustained any dents. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great mixing bowl set
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls. The silicone bottoms are great as far as keeping them in place. It’s nice that they have the measurements on the inside and the stainless is easy to clean. The variety of sizes is a great plus as well. The only thing that would make them better is if they included lids to use for leftovers or not having to transfer things like pudding that we make in them.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Cary

customer_reviews.title: Greats bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bowls set. I can puts liquids in one bowls, solids in the anothers and combines them in a third bowls... and still have two bowls left overs. The only negative I woulds have is when a recipe suggests a "large bowls," it always takes me a couple minutes to decides which of the two larger bowls I shoulds use. Now that I says thats out loud, I shoulds consider the bowls sizes to be XS, S, M, L and XL. That's its!! Thank yous Amazon... for giving me the voice to sorts out things that plague my brains.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bad John

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value. They are not particularly high quality. They're not heavy gauge metal, but the silicone bottom keeps them who you put them. They don't slide or slip around. I bought them to have for my boat - and they work great. The interior will scratch up if you use egg beaters for mixing. But if you're looking for salad bowls or a serving bowl, they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J.

customer_reviews.title: Lighter weight than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The description said mixing bowls but the box says salad bowls, and they are certainly lighter and less sturdy than most mixing bowls. I do like the nonskid base. I’m not sure how well they will hold up to heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: P Maines

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product... looks good... sturdy and nice silicon base which holds very well on granites/countertops...love it
customer_reviews.author: Harish Kumar

customer_reviews.title: NOT MADE OF STAINLESS STEEL
customer_reviews.text: While these bowls are really great and lightweight they are absolutely not made of stainless steel they are made of aluminum. There’s nothing wrong with that and they do what they’re made for, the silicone bottom works well to prevent slippage but be aware that these are not steel bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: These silicon based bowls are incredibly useful! Get them!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using these to make everything -- from cakes to mashed potatoes. The variety of sizes is very useful. The silicon base is amazing, especially when mixing (by hand or machine). It keeps the bowls from moving and toppling over.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Opened the Amazon box to find this. It was supposed to be a Christmas gift. Less than pleased to receive a product that looks like it was torn open by a wild animal.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Valko

customer_reviews.title: Superlative, transcendent!
customer_reviews.text: Nice silicone bottom for when you demand absolute silence in the kitchen. They're round. They're bowl shaped(very important for a bowl). They hold food without leaking(also very important). They're easy to throw when you you DON'T get the silence you demand in the kitchen(food critics are everywhere).
customer_reviews.author: Gary Watts

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!! Professional baker here and these are my new fav kitchen bowls! High sides, sturdy, easy to clean! Even used with a hand mixer and it didn’t scratch! Also, the colors are adorable. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McKean

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and non-slip bottom
customer_reviews.text: Love the rubber on the bottom so it prevents slipping, gets scratched easily when using hand mixer, generally not a problem, but makes it difficult if trying to use measurements on the inside of bowl. Great variety of sizes from popcorn, cake batter, watermelon for parties, pasta salad. Everyone comments on them when I take them for dinners and parties and wants to get a set too.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu 005

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: these are easy to clean and store as they are stackable. i throw them in the dishwasher with no problems, they have measurements on the inside which is nice but i don’t use them much. the largest bowl takes up quite a bit of space in the cabinet but i tend to reach for it a lot so it’s not much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: kelley

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and poorly handled
customer_reviews.text: WOW, people were NOT joking about the shortcoming of this product in the review. PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS. the bowls are TINY and the packaging looks like it's gone through some rough times. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Chen

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: My husband has just started a hobby of home cooking. He absolutely loves these bowls. The sizes are great for many different things. The silicone bottoms helps it not slide around the counter. I would definitely recommend these and I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Always check the most recent CRITICAL reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Is my set is another KNOCK-OFF? The box says NOTHING but "mixing bowls" in very faint letters, and ONLY a TINY label at one end says "made in China"! Not even if these bowls REALLY ARE stainless steel, or what metal they are! And NO MANUFACTURER NAME on the box OR the bowls. No info AT ALL. SENDING THESE BOWLS BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Charon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. I wish to return these.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. They are light weight, however they are also light quality. Look at the photos what is happening with them after a month. These are rusty spots. This is not healthy... I will be contacting the seller asking for an option to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Cheese_Cake

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the bowl are soft there are not real stainless steel. Very poor quality I really don’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brik K

customer_reviews.title: Simple but perfect for my baking and kitchen use
customer_reviews.text: These are not the heavy bulky bowls. These are the light easier to handle and quiet. I have stone counters and the sound of metal bouncing of it is like nails on a chalk board, but the silicone base is amazing for cutting that problem out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOWLS. They don’t slide/move around when I’m using them,there easy to clean and stainless. I’ve been looking for some bowls that has all 3 qualities for a while and I finally happy.
customer_reviews.author: Briyana McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Good mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: Sure they get little scratched with hand mixer but hardly visible and does not take anything away from quality. Wish there was one more size between large bowl and next size. Great thing is the silicone bottom, the bowl doesn't spin or walk all over counter.
customer_reviews.author: christy d.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Useful
customer_reviews.text: I've had these bowls for almost 6 months and with an above average amount of cooking and baking as a result of the pandemic, they've held up really well. I have a 3YO, too, and it helps that I don't have to hold bowls down anymore when she's vigorously "mixing" something to help.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set. Great quality for the price. Awesome for marinating meats, tossing salads and mixing cake/brownie/waffle batter. I will definitely purchase a set for my grandparents
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, big storage capacity and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought these few weeks ago and these are really nice! Big openings make it easy to mix ingredients. I used the larger bowls for mixing and smaller one for making salads and some time for serving . They clean up really easy too! I wish they comes with lids at least for the smaller one then I can use them for storing. But thats not a big deal. I highly recommend them as a must for baking and cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Asela

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bowls I have. They're not flimsy at all. The silicone bottom is very functional. No more bowls slipping on the countertops when I'm missing in high seeing. Because they're stainless steel, and such great quality, I've even used them to serve food at my dinner parties. They're shiny and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: KhoyaMom

customer_reviews.title: Such a great staple!!
customer_reviews.text: After moving i had To lighten the move load and unfortunately lost my old mixing bowls these are amazing! They have a non stick bottom so they don’t slide while mixing and each one is a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Jess cislo

customer_reviews.title: Glass nesting vs stainless steel nesting bowls--no challenge!!  Stainless is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I had anticipated buying glass nesting bowls, but I never knew there were stainless nesting bowls... and my mind was made up after seeing the set of stainless bow. My mind was made up and l I am thrilled with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: marylou

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific! Exactly as described and love the rubberized bottoms that keep the bowls from flying across the counter (and the floor when the pups are helping with clean up 🐶)
customer_reviews.author: Paula S

customer_reviews.title: A great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I do feel that there could be an additional bowl between the largest and the second largest. But the set is great! The silicone bottoms are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: keylee

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The bowls are thinner I'd expected but have held up well and don’t dent in normal use. The silicone bases give the bowls stability and a more substantial feel, I”d buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: txbbc

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: They are rather difficult to clean because unless you put them in the dishwasher they will not be as shiny as when you first take them out but they are very functional and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Evalina

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Easy to clean, variety of sizes. Measuring units on inside of bowls help to insure proper mixes. Absolutely love the non slip silicone bottom. An absolute blessing when teaching a young one mixtures haha
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: great set of mixing bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bowls! They are excellent quality,very sturdy & I love the colours on their bases too! I would definitely order from this seller again! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Go with Costco
customer_reviews.text: These are wide and shallow bowls. Difficult to see online. The 5 star reviews are people who don't know better and don't bake. Cheap enough that I'll keep them. Better ones at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: jasnl

customer_reviews.title: Bad, sharp cracks formed about 5 months after purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I liked them until the edges started to crack open.... Now I have bowls that are very, very sharp where they cracked and I can easily cut myself.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and no slip bottoms!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these bowels! Bought to use in making fermented foods, the non slip bottom is fantastic and much needed. Really well made and pretty to look at!
customer_reviews.author: Bea River

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I love these nesting bowls because they don't occupy much space, there's a bowl size for every type of need, they are attractive, and EASY TO CLEAN!
customer_reviews.author: Axel

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These feel lighter/more cheaply made than I expected. Mine also came with a smashed bug inside of it even though everything was covered in plastic... I just ran them through the dishwasher to sanitize them so hopefully these hold up
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Great mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls!! Especially that they are flat on bottom with the rubber grip. Would definitely recommend this to anyone. Especially for the value !!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and so far from the looks of it they’re are really nice. Not that heavy duty kind that you may be used to, but still nice. We haven’t used them yet but I think they’ll get the job done. I like them can’t wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: christina vines - gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love the functionality and the look. They nest well for storage and the silicone is definitely helpful. A couple of times my son tried to swipe a bowl off the table but wasn't able to because the grip is that good.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Hahn-Galioto

customer_reviews.title: Silicone bottom
customer_reviews.text: The silicone bottom keeps them who you put them. They don't slide or slip around. The best product for your kitchen. Great for Cooking and storage. I love it.Try and you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ala

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I needed a set of durable stainless steel bowls for cooking. I love the silicone bottoms-- keeps the bowls from sliding around on the counter. The various sizes of the bowls are perfect! No regrets-- but the hidden bonus is now my girls think the bowls are "cute" and want to help cook more! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mom25Kids

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowls
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and nice size bowls for food preparation. Great for salads and fruits. I will buy more to give as house warming gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Fu

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for mixing but also using as bowls for salads, cereal, etc. The silicone bottoms make them non slip and prevent marks in the counter when mixing. Great bowls!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Colorful mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: I’m so inlove with my new mixing bowls,because really convenient of the sizes I really recommend for the people who loves to bake and eat salad like me..
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and light mixing bowls. The antislip base is very useful, and they nest perfectly. Safe dishwasher machine.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Husband gave to me as a gift. These are beautiful, colorful, easy to store and stay put on the counter. (Unmovable actually)
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Camp

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls Make You Feel Like a Pro
customer_reviews.text: Used a mezzaluna chopper in the 7 qt. bowl to make a big chopped salad. Worked great. Used a handheld electric mixer in the 3.5 qt. bowl. Worked great too. Bowl stayed in place. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Great for baking
customer_reviews.text: There needs to be one more size but I love these for baking! The large one is great for salads. The non stick bottom is handy for hand mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Have had them a few months and so far have held up great. I love the bottoms. I’m always worried about scratching my countertop so these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Knipp

customer_reviews.title: Love these bowls!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our previous set of mixing bowls were ceramic so of course we broke most of them! We love how these bowls cannot be broken. Only complaint is that you can’t put them in the microwave but we are very happy with them. The rubber on the bottom is awesome to keep the bowls in place also.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted- great quality, sizes, everything. Super happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Krystle R.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought then for my daughter as a gift. I like what I saw when she opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, the rubber on the bottom helps keep the bowl from twirling like ones I have had in the past!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Etter

customer_reviews.title: Use
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed set of mixing bowls for use in food/bread preparation. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Heelan

customer_reviews.title: Love these bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls. They nestle and take little Soave in cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: An absolute winner. Very good and can be washed in a washing machine. Having a rubber at the bottom helps making no sound when you put in on the table in the kitchen. Absolute a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Aliya

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these, so much lighter then my old glass mixing bowls
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I used them as soon as I received them. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James H, Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls
customer_reviews.text: The silicone bases make it really easy to mix as it helps them stay still.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them a handful of times so far but they've been exactly what ive needed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowls! Super cute-great grip! Stack beautifully! Recommend for sure
customer_reviews.author: I.M.J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 9yr old who loves to cook and bake. She loves them! Easy for her to use and clean. She isn't worried about dropping them and breaking them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly DeCamp

customer_reviews.title: Worth spending a bit more than the lowest price
customer_reviews.text: They won't move when you mix things in them. The largest is quite large and will fulfill pretty much any home kitchen needs. Very easy to clean. I've gotten cheaper mixing bowls and it's worth it go pay a bit extra even though it's really just bowls. The rubber bottom is great, and the material is sturdy. Won't be breaking any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bressler

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, heavy duty, and stackable. They seem to be very well-made & the non-slip bottoms work well. Good quality bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Mel's Market Place

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but very cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product gets the job done, but do not expect high quality. By reading "stainless steel," I thought they were going to be a bit more sturdy and heavy. Not much to these bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Waikelejake

customer_reviews.title: Durable and anti slip
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace some old stainless bowls I had as hand me downs. These feel very durable and I dont think I will be needing to replace them any time soon. They're great. I wasnt sure about the Silicon bottom BUT having a grippy bottom definitely comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and the sizes! They are definitely a must have in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile! Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for so many things. Bread baking, batter mixing, salad making! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: phly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are pretty awesome! Love the nonslip silicone base! These things are lightweight yet durable!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Price point
customer_reviews.text: Great set of bowls. Nice finish, great sizes, good value. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: just me 123

customer_reviews.title: The color rubber bottom is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I needed mixing bowls and I’m so happy I purchased these!!! The rubber bottom is extremely helpful, they don’t move when you’re using them. They’re also easy to clean, but keep in mind, I’ve only hand washed and don’t plan on putting them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Not 18/10 heavy duty steel
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting them to be more heavier that what they are.
customer_reviews.author: LaBuck

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I love that these bowls stay in place while using them. I don’t have to worry about accidentally bumping them off the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bowls
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher safe, doesn't slip when I mix on the counter, great colors, awesome that it has the different sizes for whatever I need. I put the smaller ones in the fridge all the time and they have held up really great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Stackables
customer_reviews.text: I really like mine. I purchased 2 sets. One for a women's shelter kitchen and one for mine. I really like the non-skid bottoms and they do great in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Petree

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fair price
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are of great quality, and great to wash by hand and in dishwasher. They’re well-finished and durable. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Moreen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls. Sturdy and a great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and don't take up much space
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flat, grippy bottoms on these, it makes mixing things up very easy. I wash them by hand as my dish washer was KIA a few weeks ago, and they wash easily enough doing that. I would recommend this set to others looking to get new mixing bowls
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B

customer_reviews.title: Stainless bowls
customer_reviews.text: They are light and easy to clean. Very satisfied. A+
customer_reviews.author: Sue Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls! Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mixing bowls! Dishwasher friendly (as advertised). Sturdy and lightweight. Slip proof due to the rubber bottoms and the colors are pretty too. Happy on all fronts. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them! Very handy, easy to clean, and sizes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set and the non flat non stick bottoms. Well worth the price. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: beaaann

customer_reviews.title: Look great, work great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife (and me a little bit). Very nice and stable mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The rubber bottom keeps them in place and they are sturdy yet light!
customer_reviews.author: Marium Dayek

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of bowls
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like the stay put bottoms on each bowl. I hate chasing the bowl around the counter, but these bowls stay right where you put them. And I really like the colors on the bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S.

product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls (Set of 5), Non Slip Colorful Silicone Bottom Nesting Storage Bowls by Regiller, Polished Mirror Finish For Healthy Meal Mixing and Prepping 1.5-2 - 2.5-3.5 - 7QT
product_meta.description:
Product Features:
Material: Premium stainless steel
Various Size: 
Bowl 1.5QT
Bowl 2.0QT
Bowl 2.5QT
Bowl 3.5QT
Bowl 7.0QT
5 Sizes of mixing bowls can feed family needs and can replace other similar containers

Why Choose Our Bowls:
Don't worry about cleaning!
Arc bottom with smoothly, no dead corner when clean. The bowls can be still shine after washing with water and soap or in the dishwasher.

Don't worry about additional extra water or flour etc
The bowls has clear accurate etched volume measurement mark for your accurate needs.

Each set consists of 5 beautiful colors
Plus non slip colorful silicone bottoms, it looks colorful, attractive to eyes and easy to identify. And it also stable when you operate.

Nesting bowls for space saving
Don't worry! It enables to store the bowls one inside the other – 5 IN 1, saving storage space in your kitchen! Besides, it is easy to pick a bowl out of the nested set.

Attractive and practical design
Polished mirror finish inside will remain shiny lasts and lasts, just like new ones! 
An easy to grip rounded-lip on the stainless steel bowl set makes handling easier.
Deepen design, no worry about spatter when you are doing egg beating and whisking.

Warm Tips:
1. Please disinfect with high temperature water or soak a few minutes before using
2. Please avoid knife or sharp things

Order Your Own Set Of Colorful Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls Today!
feature_bullets: MATERIAL: These mixing bowls are made of premium stainless steel, resist dents and rust proof, a mirror finish inside and brushed finish outside design

MEASUREMENT LINES: The full state of the bowl is 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3.5, 7 quart (To remind you and avoid to spill out when using, the lines is not marked to the highest edge!). 5 different size bowls can be stackable placed for easy storage and carry
NON SLIP SILICONE BOTTOMS: Flat silicone bases would prevent the metal bowls slippage when mixing, beating and whipping! Also protect the desk from high temperature
COLORFUL COOKING: Easy to identify even for kids, perfect for everyday use on your home table. Coloring your kitchen with fresh look by these multicolor stainless steel bowls
EASY USE: A deepening basin type for mixing ingredients without any splash, the bowls are ideal for whisking eggs, mixing dessert, baking batters, cake dough, tossing salads, marinating
